title: Ticket #668: DAGMan reports cycle if unable to monitor node job log file
description: If the new lazy log file code is unable to monitor the log file for a node job (e.g., the log file specification points to a non-existant directory), DAGMan reports a cycle in the DAG, even if there is no cycle. (It correctly reports the log monitoring error, but also reports a cycle.)
